parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause the vehicle to lose braking control, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The vehicle will not stop when the brakes are applied
the brake pedal goes to the floor with no brake control
the brake system fails to function properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power assist brake booster can cause the brake pedal to feel spongy or soft, leading to a loss of braking control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal goes to the floor with no brake control
the brake system fails to function properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Defective rotors can cause the ABS system to malfunction, leading to a loss of braking control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake system fails to function properly

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Sudden Unintended Acceleration (SUA) due to Throttle Malfunction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden unintended acceleration can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries, posing a significant risk to the driver, passengers, and other road users.
symptoms: The accelerator pedal becomes stuck in the open position
causing the vehicle to accelerate rapidly and uncontrollably

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Climate Control and Electrical System Malfunction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning climate control and electrical system can cause distractions while driving, especially at night, and potentially lead to accidents due to reduced visibility.
symptoms: The air vents change direction or speed randomly
the climate control system cannot be controlled
the panel lights flash or dim
and the system may be unresponsive.
